Articles.Content:
Hi guys. My name is Hexdragon and I host this thread and I own a youtube channel. I make planes and jets that fly stable and acrobatically.

[thread=92662]Do you have a really cool looking plane that flips out of control and you want it fixed? Go here to get it fixed[/thread]

Many of my videos have some visual mods involved:

- Kerbpaint (always)

- HotRocket (Always too)

- Improved free chase cam (most of the time)

- Persistent trails (sometimes)

- Kerbtown (kerbin side)

- Kerbcam (occasionally

- BDarmory (sometimes)

I will take requests from you guys one what I should build next, so don't hesitate.

I have centered my crafts and many things I build to planes, specifically jets. There might be a car, or even rocket here and there, though.

Here is the official complete list of all my public crafts:

SSTO to the mun

VTOL Fighter Jet "Eris"

Su-27 Replica

F-117 Nighthawk Replica

Fighter Jet "Ataraxia <----- you're in for a treat with this one

Ultimate armed Tiny Vtol SSTO

Random Crafts and bits

Random Crafts and Bits 2

Fighter SSTO "Bumblebee"

[thread=93698]Space Kraken[/thread]

[thread=94072]Fighter Vtol "Esoter"[/thread]

Revised "Ataraxia"

Su-35 Replica

F-35 Replica

Edited October 10, 2014 by manni01
Nice ones! I like how you keep some classic techniques integrated, while still keeping them original. rep'd

Nice ones! I like how you keep some classic techniques integrated, while still keeping them original. rep'd

Thanks, I probably put most of my work into the Eris jet, but I think the Su-27 replica looks better
That's because the Su-27 is awesome in every form it's ever been portrayed.

This is my oldest design. It is a SSTO which has the capability to land on the mun (it can definitely land on minimus) and come back on one piece. It has crew for two kerbals and has enough dV to slightly mess up an encounter burn. For example, I had enough dV to get back to the island runway, even though I completely messed up my aerobraking and the height above KSC (you'll see)

I really want to give you guys the download, but I think when I cleaned up my ship folder, I deleted it

Edited August 29, 2014 by manni01

This is my first design which entered me into the idea of fighter jets. Compared to my designs now, it looks clunky, but it is quite capable. It has a VTOL mode which can be toggled with 1 and the normal engines toggle with 2. Its colored green and black with kerbpaint because green is my favourite color, and at the time, i was really happy about the design, thats why it earned the green color. Its super agile and responsive and stable. I thing for every vtol I ever made, don't pitch down while having the vtol activated, it flips the crafts out.

This old beast has a download, definitely

http://download727./ryebjootb1sg/lz3dkfpaxi76bjy/Fighter+_Eris_.craft

Edited August 29, 2014 by manni01

This is my replica of the su-27 fighter jet. It has a quite distinct look and its quite maneuverable too. Its kind of blue because I saw a picture of it in blue camo colors. It can fly decently fast and its stunt capable if used correctly. It doesn't have vtol or anything special, its just a maneuverable replica.

This russian jet replica can be downloaded if you like it:

http://download748./twwoboukw8xg/m85cxhyyobvkgo7/Su-27.craft

Edited August 29, 2014 by manni01

This is really just a normal replica of the F-117 nighthawk "bomber". I know why it is in the fighter series, but I'll refer to it as a bomber. There are two version you can download. One is colored with kerbpaint (completely black), but there might be some fuel flow issues. The second non-kerbpainted bomber doesn't have this issue. The video previews the painted version because it is normal when I use it, but there is some fuel pipes not connecting problem with the painted one, idk. Anyways. This bomber wasn't made to be an acrobatic fighter jet, which means that you can't fly under any bridges anytime soon. It is super stable, idk how anyone could flip this craft out.

Kerbpainted version:

http://download1498./d30txrgd1bgg/vws4dscdys63w6s/F-117.craft

Fixed Version with wierd name:

http://download1523./nxncduawsg3g/ct5c5vccy3b53b9/ALLL+OFF+THIS.craft

Now this is probably my best jet ever. It looks cool and it sooooo capable. It is the most maneuverable craft I ever made. It has Vtol for extra measures . This thing is probably the embodiment of... me. Anyways, this thing can really do anything, and if not, it can be slightly modified to fit the requirements. It has a little camo/pattern design with green, because it definitely earned lime green. Action group 1 toggles vtol engines and Action group 2 toggles main engine. It only has 1 engine, but it flys fast enough.

This frightening but still awesome thingy has a download:

http://download947./dhqqvaddh2yg/1g3o5xxis6981f6/Fighter+_Ataraxia_.craft

For some reason I got inspired to make an ultimate craft: Vtol, SSTO, Maneuverable, stable, and armed. This is what I came out with and I am really happy as how it turned out. It has a lot of reaction wheels which gives it extra performance when in Vtol mode. It isn't maneuverable without vtol, because two pairs to delta deluxe winglets only give 1.7 lift, yeah, not a lot. You should always fly this thing with sas, but otherwise, 1 toggles Vtol, and 2 toggles main engines:

Download it here:

http://download2019./fkxjjvn3j5xg/nydjqcmfqqf1llc/Tiny+Attack+VTOL+SSTO.craft

If you have problems with the craft, contact me.

Also, I like to hear your feedback.

Nice replicas! I want to see a confrontation between my Super Hornet and your Su-27.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

PS: I have a revision 2 of the harrier. I guess vtols are in style now.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4toqaxj4661kd9s/AV-8B%20R1.craft?dl=0

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited September 2, 2014 by andrew123

@andrew123 Thats actually quite cool with the super hornet. I tried to build a hornet of myself, but it sucks compared to yours. I can try doing a mareczex333 dogfight style persistent trail thing for the fight off (that will literally take me a year to do D: )

btw i have a mid-air refueling vid, check my signature

@andrew123 Thats actually quite cool with the super hornet. I tried to build a hornet of myself, but it sucks compared to yours. I can try doing a mareczex333 dogfight style persistent trail thing for the fight off (that will literally take me a year to do D: )

btw i have a mid-air refueling vid, check my signature

My midair refueling labs died a long time ago. Also, the super hornet is receiving some updates for carrier ops.

I love F-117. Looks very good.

[h=2][/h]

Thanks for appreciating my crafts

This video isn't created to show you another craft for download, but it is here to show you videos of some crafts that I have lying around which I don't think any of you want because they sporadically break off parts (thats actually the only problem). There are a some cars and an A-10 thunderbolt replica which I don't like too much because the tail elevatons clip and bug around and they make it ugly. Other than that I have a wierd bomber vtol, and a funny bit about drifting and donuts. Go to 9:50 for the drifting and funny part.

Edited September 9, 2014 by manni01

This is another post just to show you that I have other crafts up my sleeve (and other videos revolving KSP), but these are a bit weird and they weren't as good as I hoped. Yet I released them and I guess they deserve a slot on my thread. I'm not going to stick too much effort into this post, I'm just going to link you the old threads on which they were posted.
